headline: RTX (RTX) Valuation Check As Shares Trade Near Fair Value Estimate
summary: RTX stock: key figures investors are watching RTX (RTX) has been drawing attention after recent trading, with the stock last closing at US$203.50. That price sits alongside a reported US$88.6b in revenue and US$6.7b in net income.
